atlantis_talk_06_rival_01:
So [VAR PKNAME(0001)] came to our age through
the time machine...[VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_06_rival_02:
Then it lived here awhile with the professor?
Along with another one of its kind?[VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_06_botan_01: That seems to be the story.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_06_rival_03:
So we...brought it back home, kind of! Or to its
second home, at least![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_06_botan_02: I guess this place should be familiar to it, sure.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_06_rival_04:
Awww, that’s great! A chance to unwind and bask
in the familiarity![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_06_friend_01:
That...doesn’t exactly jibe with how it’s been
acting all spooked since we got here.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_06_friend_02:
It doesn’t seem eager to come out of its ball
anytime soon, either.[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_06_rival_05:
Really? I thought it was just scared ’cause we
were so high up.[VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_06_friend_03: Huh? Who said it was scared of heights?[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_06_botan_04:
Given how [VAR PKNAME(0001)] was acting earlier...
I think something bad happened to it here.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_06_botan_05:
Sometimes you get all shaky just seeing a place
that you’ve got bad memories of...[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_06_botan_06:
It was the same for me when I was being ignored
by everyone in my class.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_06_botan_07:
Just thinking about school made me want to hide
away somewhere... So I know how it feels.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_06_friend_04:
So...maybe it got hurt down here in Area Zero,
just like Mabosstiff?[VAR 0114(0006)]
atlantis_talk_06_botan_08:
We can’t know for sure, but...it doesn’t change
into its battle form anymore, right?[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_06_rival_07:
But that’s so sad! We gotta do something to
make it feel better![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_06_rival_08:
And no, I’m NOT just saying that ’cause I super
badly wanna battle [VAR PKNAME(0001)] myself![VAR 0114(0004)]
atlantis_talk_06_botan_10:
...Seriously? Well, at least you said it and not
one of us.[VAR 0114(0008)]
atlantis_talk_06_friend_05:
Nemona, you’re...kind of unbelievable. In a
mostly good way.[VAR 0114(0006)]
